item.description:
The next movie event will be Saturday evening 8/26/06. The movie is called The Illusionist and the show time is 7:05.

Lets meet in front of the escalators at 6:45 (with your ticket in hand). It might be a good idea to buy your ticket in advance since it has just recently been released.

I am also planning on going to Cold Stones after the movie for an ice cream with anyone who is interested in ingesting some extra calories!

Contact me if you have any questions.

See you there!
item.name: Movie Meet up
